name: Nano Banana 3D Action Figure
template: create a 1/7 scale commercialized figure of {character} in the illustration, in a realistic styie and environment.Place the figure on a computer desk, using a circular transparent acrylic base without any text.On the computer screen, display the ZBrush modeling process of the figure.Next to the computer screen, place a BANDAI-style toy packaging box printedwith the original artwork.
